====
rika
====


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/rika.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/rika

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/lvzhi/rika.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/lvzhi/rika

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/rika/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://rika.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status




This is a python library that make it easy to use technical analysis stock market in China.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://rika.readthedocs.io.
